column5: Had considered them for last years fly-in but couldn't picture doing 7 days with an 80 lb. per person weight limit.They had a nice sign that we drove by as we continued up Rt 105 to Red Lake.I believe that the same folks are involved with Gawleys Lodge.

a group of us went McVicker Lake 6 years ago. it was great and Lang (sp) Lake is a portage, we caught alot of big walleyes there 25-27 inches. that outpost was owned by a different person then but the cabin was new and the fishing was great.
